items.title: Reopening Multithreating Issue
items.body:
<!-- Before you open an issue, please search on the [issue tracker](../) if a similar issue already exists or has been closed before. -->

## Description
If you activate the

`const bool USE_WORKER_THREAD = true;`

Option in the plugin the plugin won't work due to the fact that the "QML UI" , "QML Model" is running on another thread access us blocked.



## How to Reproduce
Steps to reproduce the behavior:
1. Set `const bool USE_WORKER_THREAD = true;` in the plugin compile it
2. App is not running as expected


## Expected behavior
<!--- A clear and concise description of what you expected to happen. -->
App is running and working smoothly

## Screenshots
<!--- If applicable, add screenshots to help explain your problem. Otherwise you can delete this section. -->

## Your Environment
<!--- Include as many relevant details about the environment you experienced the bug in -->
* Version used: 0.8.0
* Running on: <!-- Remove / add environment(s) -->
  - YIO Remote
  - Desktop
  - Standalone Raspberry Pi
* Operating System and version if not running on YIO Remote: Ubuntu QT 5.12

## Additional context
<!--- Add any other context about the problem here. Otherwise you can delete this section. -->
<!--- How has this issue affected you? What are you trying to accomplish? -->
<!--- Providing context helps us come up with a solution that is most useful in the real world -->
If you activate  `const bool USE_WORKER_THREAD = true;` in any plugin the remote crashes
